oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cavalry saber and scabbard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Model 1860 light cavalry saber and scabbard, made by C[hristopher] Roby of West Chelmsford, Mass. with "1864" stamped on blade. Donor acquired the saber as a paperboy in an Erwin, Tenn. from a bar owner in payment for newspaper delivery. The model 1860 was the standard saber for the Union cavalry throughout the Civil War.
